# Task 1: 
#Univerzium: planéta "Orionis"
# -------------------------------
# 1.1 Atomic Types --------------------------------------------------------

# Numeric (double)
mean_surface_temp <- 22.4          # priemerná teplota (°C)
planet_area_mil_km2 <- 2.38        # povrch planéty v miliónoch km²
mean_altitude_m <- 560.7           # priemerná nadmorská výška (m)
exploration_index <- 4.6           # vedecko-turistický index (1-5)

# Integer
satellite_count <- as.integer(3)   # počet prirodzených satelitov
urban_centers <- as.integer(9)     # počet väčších sídel
population_k <- as.integer(3120)   # populácia v tisícoch

# Logical
has_liquid_water <- TRUE
supports_life <- TRUE

# Character
celestial_body <- "Orionis"
stellar_region <- "Helian Cluster"
planet_type <- "Subtropical"

# Výpis základných údajov
cat("Planéta", celestial_body, "sa nachádza v oblasti", stellar_region, 
    "a je typu", planet_type, ".\n")
cat("Má", satellite_count, "satelity,", urban_centers, 
    "urbanistické centrá a populáciu približne", population_k, "tisíc.\n")
cat("Priemerná povrchová teplota je", mean_surface_temp, "°C a index prieskumu je", exploration_index, "/5.\n")
cat("Tekutá voda:", has_liquid_water, "— Podporuje život:", supports_life, "\n\n")

# 1.2 Vectors -------------------------------------------------------------

# Kombinácia numeric + integer premenných
quantitative_vector <- c(mean_surface_temp, planet_area_mil_km2,
                         mean_altitude_m, exploration_index,
                         as.numeric(satellite_count),
                         as.numeric(urban_centers),
                         as.numeric(population_k))
print("Kombinovaný numerický vektor:")
print(quantitative_vector)

# Sekvenčný vektor: od 27 do 100 po 8
progression_vector <- seq(from = 27, to = 100, by = 8)
print("Sekvenčný vektor (27 to 100 by 8):")
print(progression_vector)

# Logický vektor s náhodnými hodnotami TRUE/FALSE
set.seed(321)
binary_pattern <- sample(c(TRUE, FALSE), size = 10, replace = TRUE)
print("Náhodný logický vektor (10 prvkov):")
print(binary_pattern)
cat("\n")

# 1.3 Matrix --------------------------------------------------------------

# 3x3 matica s náhodnými hodnotami od -50 do 50
set.seed(99)
matrix_elements <- sample(-50:50, size = 9, replace = TRUE)
orionis_grid <- matrix(matrix_elements, nrow = 3, ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE)
rownames(orionis_grid) <- c("Polar_Belt", "Equatorial_Range", "Southern_Rift")
colnames(orionis_grid) <- c("Zone_X", "Zone_Y", "Zone_Z")

print("Orionis 3x3 matica:")
print(orionis_grid)

# Priemery riadkov a stĺpcov
row_means_orionis <- rowMeans(orionis_grid)
col_means_orionis <- colMeans(orionis_grid)
cat("Priemery riadkov:\n"); print(row_means_orionis)
cat("Priemery stĺpcov:\n"); print(col_means_orionis)
cat("\n")

# 1.4 List ----------------------------------------------------------------

orionis_compendium <- list(
  mean_surface_temp = mean_surface_temp,
  planet_area_mil_km2 = planet_area_mil_km2,
  mean_altitude_m = mean_altitude_m,
  exploration_index = exploration_index,
  satellite_count = satellite_count,
  urban_centers = urban_centers,
  population_k = population_k,
  has_liquid_water = has_liquid_water,
  supports_life = supports_life,
  celestial_body = celestial_body,
  stellar_region = stellar_region,
  planet_type = planet_type,
  quantitative_vector = quantitative_vector,
  progression_vector = progression_vector,
  binary_pattern = binary_pattern,
  orionis_grid = orionis_grid,
  description = "Orionis je subtropická planéta s rozsiahlym oceánskym pásom, 
                 vyváženou biosférou a prosperujúcou vedeckou komunitou 
                 v rámci Helian Clusteru."
)

print("Prehľad položiek v orionis_compendium:")
print(names(orionis_compendium))
cat("\n")

# 1.5 Factor --------------------------------------------------------------

# Faktor reprezentujúci úroveň zdrojov v rôznych oblastiach
resource_tier <- factor(c("high", "medium", "low", "medium", "low", "high", "medium"),
                        levels = c("low", "medium", "high"),
                        ordered = TRUE)
print("Resource Tier Factor:")
print(resource_tier)

cat("Tabuľka úrovní zdrojov:\n")
print(table(resource_tier))
cat("\n")

# 1.6 Data Frame ----------------------------------------------------------

# Dátový rámec: mestá/regióny planéty Orionis
settlement_names <- c("Altaris", "Virella", "Nemoris", "Caldora", "Zenithia", "Meridion")
inhabitants_k <- c(540, 410, 180, 265, 620, 205)
energy_index <- c(980, 730, 350, 480, 1300, 390)
regional_temp_C <- c(23.4, 20.1, 14.7, 19.9, 16.5, 18.3)
hab_status <- c(TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, FALSE)
terrain_type <- factor(c("coastal", "inland", "plateau", "coastal", "plateau", "wetland"))

orionis_data <- data.frame(
  Region = settlement_names,
  Population_k = inhabitants_k,
  EnergyIndex = energy_index,
  AvgTemp_C = regional_temp_C,
  Habitable = hab_status,
  Terrain = terrain_type,
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

cat("Štruktúra dátového rámca orionis_data:\n")
str(orionis_data)
cat("\nSúhrn dátového rámca:\n")
print(summary(orionis_data))
cat("\n")

# Nový stĺpec – Energetický index na osobu
orionis_data$Energy_per_capita <- orionis_data$EnergyIndex / (orionis_data$Population_k * 1000)

cat("Data frame s pridaným výpočtovým stĺpcom:\n")
print(orionis_data)


cat("\n-- Hotovo: dátový svet planéty Orionis je inicializovaný. --\n")
